meanings.definition: The insole of a shoe that supports the foot.
meanings.sent1: I bought new shoes with soft footbeds for my tired feet.
meanings.sent2: The orthopedic footbeds in my sneakers help with my arch support.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks my footbeds are her new cozy bed!
meanings.sent4: The footbeds of the shoes hugged my feet like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: Walking on cloud-like footbeds feels like a dream.

meanings.definition: A cushioned insert for added comfort in footwear.
meanings.sent1: The gel footbeds in my sandals make walking long distances easier.
meanings.sent2: Sheepskin footbeds are known for their luxurious feel in slippers.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the footbeds for mini pillows!
meanings.sent4: The memory foam footbeds molded perfectly to my feet.
meanings.sent5: Stepping on the plush footbeds felt like walking on clouds.
